about_the_game:
Upgrade the romance, nostalgia or suspense in your games and stories with theses 25 new fantastic backgrounds! Created by Five Happiness, Eberouge Background image Pack 3 features 25 images of European-themed towns and indoors spaces in beautifully drawn details.

A renaissance town with a classic, historic atmosphere; antique shop, old brick walls with arched walk through, solarium with various plants, open spaces with gorgeous mountain views... Eberouge Background Image Pack 3 has great assets to help you bring your games and stories to life!

FEATURES:

* 25 backgrounds
* Beautiful realistic images such as antique shops, arched walkways, solariums, mountain views and more!
* Backgrounds for European themed towns, exterior and interiors and more!
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers or the engines of your choice, however, please note that the sales of a game using this content is NOT allowed where the buyer is a corporation or any multi-person entity.
